version_description:
+ Added the ability to set the location manually (entering coordinates).
+ Minor bug fixes and app enhancements.
+ User interface changes and improvements.

Contact us 24/7 at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions.

Your feedback is highly appreciated.

+NEW! iPhone X, 8 and 8 Plus full support! The app is updated for the new devices and can be used safely
+Fixed minor bugs

+ Added the ability to set the location manually (entering coordinates).
+ Minor bug fixes and app enhancements.
+ User interface changes and improvements.

Contact us 24/7 at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions.

Your feedback is highly appreciated.

+ Added the ability to set the location manually (entering coordinates).
+ Minor bug fixes and app enhancements.
+ User interface changes and improvements.

Contact us 24/7 at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions.

Your feedback is highly appreciated.

+ iOS 13 support
+ support for iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max
+ new satellite added (QUESS)
+ various app enhancements other small changes

Your reviews on the App Store are always welcome.
If there is anything we can do to help you, please feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com.

+ Fixed bug with the "Cancel Subscription" button.
+ Other minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Your ratings and reviews on the App Store are always appreciated.
If there is anything we can do to help you, please feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com.

Thank you for using Satellite Tracker!

+ Added Starlink satellites.
+ Fixed bug with duplicate notifications.
+ Fixed bug with deleting notifications.
+ Fixed bug with the ‘Cancel Subscription’ button.
+ Other minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.
+ Now the app shows how much time is left until the end of the satellite flyby (when tracked in real time).

Your reviews on the App Store are always appreciated.
If there is anything we can do to help you, please feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com.

Thank you for using Satellite Tracker!

+ Added Starlink satellites.
+ Fixed bug with duplicate notifications.
+ Fixed bug with deleting notifications.
+ Fixed bug with the ‘Cancel Subscription’ button.
+ Other minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.
+ Now the app shows how much time is left until the end of the satellite flyby (when tracked in real time).

Your reviews on the App Store are always appreciated.
If there is anything we can do to help you, please feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com.

Thank you for using Satellite Tracker!

+ Added SpaceX’s Crew Dragon (Dragon 2). The spacecraft will appear in the app as soon as it is launched.
+ Added Starlink satellites.
+ Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions. Your feedback is always welcome.

Great update for "Back to School" campaign:

- Full satellites database
- Track multiple satellites in the sky simultaneously
- List of all satellite's passes including passes in daylight and in the shadow
- Notifications for each satellite's pass can be set separately
- Satellites altitude graphics

Feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions. Your feedback is always welcome.

Great update for "Back to School" campaign:

- Full satellites database

Bug fixes:
- Compass direction corrected
- Manual location view fixed

Feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions. Your feedback is always welcome.

Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you find bugs, have problems, questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com.

Your reviews and ratings on the App Store are always appreciated.

+ Satellite NORAD IDs added to the list cells
+ Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
